scripts.db:enter: docker exec -it directus_postgres psql -U directus -d postgres
scripts.db:init-postgis: docker exec -i directus_postgres psql -U directus -d directus < scripts/init_postgis.sql
scripts.db:backup: docker exec -t directus_postgres pg_dump -U directus directus > ./cms/backups/backup.sql
scripts.db:restore: docker exec -i directus_postgres psql -U directus -d directus < ./cms/backups/backup.sql
scripts.schema:backup: docker exec -it directus_app npx directus schema snapshot ./cms/backups/schema.yaml
scripts.schema:restore: docker exec -it directus_app npx directus schema apply ./cms/backups/schema.yaml
